game.shortDescription: THE IMPOSSIBLE은 최소한의 원근법 환상 퍼즐 게임입니다. 당신은 IMPOSSIBLE 세계에서 작은 사각형을 제어하고 기억하십시오. 불가능한 것은 없습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: THE IMPOSSIBLE is a minimal perspective illusion puzzle game. You control a small square in the IMPOSSIBLE world and remember: nothing is IMPOSSIBLE.

reviewHighlights.text: Great little puzzle game with a nice theme and a tactical dark mode so your eyes won’t burn into oblivion. It’s short (~30 mins), so grab it at a disc...
